Seeking a challenging and professionally enriching career in software development and put my maximum efforts for the growth of the organization & myself.

given.text:
Satya it was an amazing experience working with a wonderful person like you who always strives the best for the team & organization. Your passion & the extra ordinary efforts in learning the new technologies like Hybris, UI5 etc were remarkable. You always set the bar high for your team. The way you mentor/groom the team, volunteer to share the technical expertise are some of the qualities which i always admire. Just words can not do justice to quantify the credibility you gained for our portal team. You are one of the sincere & committed team member in our project. Love to work with you again...
…
See more

Myself and Satya were working in Verizon under different portfolio’s, N&T and CFO respectively. As a Senior Architect, Satya has been always ready to share his knowledge in his areas of technical expertise and open to learn and try out new technology. He is very good in his area of expertise SAP and Java. He has been part of many Center of Excellences like Mobile and UX. He has worked across groups for SAP in his areas of expertise like RWD, SUP, BB, Hybris, Portal & Fiori. In short Satya is a good peer to work with very knowledgeable, honest and a person with good values.
…
See more

I was with Satya in Verizon in different groups. He is very knowledgeable in many technologies (not limit with single technology). Attended his sessions & given lot of knowledge for me. He would be a great Asset to any company as an employee and even more so as a Man of Integrity and Honor.
I worked with Satya in Verizon and Satya is one of the best architects, his guidelines towards coding standards are appreciated. His analytical thinking towards product development is out-of-box.

Satya, is one of the best among all the people I have ever worked with. As I remember, Satya was a very productive person, is hardworking, broad-minded and forward thinking individual and proactive. Desire for proficiency and education makes Satya a valuable asset to the team. All the best.

It has been a great experience working with Satya in Verizon. He was like a live wire in the team showing true leadership capabilities and great business acumen thereby adding lot of business value to the Clients. His highly adorable work speaks about him all the time. More than work he is a great human that i have ever seen in my real life and good at public relations which is equally important. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors.
…
See more

Satya is a dedicated and valuable resource and is definitely an asset to the organization. I have interacted with Satya on numerous occassions and he came out to be always helpful and professional to the core. Its not a surprise that he received lot of accolades and appreciation from the leadership. Best wishes to Satya in all his future endeavours.
…
See more
Satya is quick learner and hard worker. He is having more experience and understanding on multiple technologies and He use to play key roles in all the assignments.
Satya had been a great resource to work with. He mastered the new technology in no time and delivered beyond our expectation. Sudip
Satya is an excellent Sr Architect and his commitment and dedication is really appreciable .He is a quick learner and having niche skills like SAP Hybris ,SAP FIORI and UX.
